meanings.definition: To make tropical in character or quality.
meanings.sent1: She tropicalized her wardrobe by adding bright colors and floral patterns.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant tropicalized its menu by adding dishes with exotic fruits and spices.
meanings.sent3: The party was so tropicalized with palm trees and coconuts that it felt like a mini vacation.
meanings.sent4: His music was tropicalized with the sounds of steel drums and ocean waves.
meanings.sent5: The room was tropicalized with warm temperatures and lush green plants.

meanings.definition: To adapt to a tropical environment.
meanings.sent1: The animals tropicalized by growing thicker fur to survive in the heat.
meanings.sent2: The plants tropicalized by developing broad leaves to capture more sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The tourists tropicalized quickly and started wearing light clothing and hats.
meanings.sent4: The car tropicalized by needing a special cooling system to handle the hot climate.
meanings.sent5: The buildings tropicalized with thatched roofs and open windows to stay cool.
